comment: Very kind professor who cares about what he is teaching. This class is graded solely on 4 group projects so make sure you have a good team!

Class consists of McGraw homework, 3 exams, and 1 group project involving going to a manufacturing plant.
Everything is open book and not proctored. My advice is to look up the excel templates for the textbook.

Scott is super nice and cares about students and what he teaches. Don't be afraid to reach out to him.
